card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
card.text: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. -3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn. -8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

card.name: Akroma's Memorial
card.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.

card.name: Angelic Benediction
card.text: Exalted Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.text: You gain 7 life.

card.name: Arbor Elf
card.text: {T}: Untap target Forest.

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Arctic Aven
card.text: Flying Arctic Aven gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {W}: Arctic Aven gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Arms Dealer
card.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Attended Knight
card.text: First strike When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Augur of Bolas
card.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Battle of Wits
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

card.name: Battleflight Eagle
card.text: Flying When Battleflight Eagle enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Reckoning
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Bloodhunter Bat
card.text: Flying When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Bond Beetle
card.text: When Bond Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Boundless Realms
card.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of lands you control, and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bountiful Harvest
card.text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

card.name: Captain of the Watch
card.text: Vigilance Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Captain's Call
card.text: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Cathedral of War
card.text: Cathedral of War enters the battlefield tapped. Exalted {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
card.text: +1: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to target creature or player. -2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. -6: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Chandra's Fury
card.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Chronomaton
card.text: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.

card.name: Cleaver Riot
card.text: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Clock of Omens
card.text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Courtly Provocateur
card.text: {T}: Target creature attacks this turn if able. {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Craterize
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Crippling Blight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.

card.name: Crusader of Odric
card.text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Dark Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

card.name: Diabolic Revelation
card.text: Search your library for up to X cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Disciple of Bolas
card.text: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Divine Favor

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Door to Nothingness
card.text: Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped. {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

card.name: Downpour
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures.

card.name: Dragon Hatchling
card.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Duress
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Duty-Bound Dead
card.text: Exalted {3}{B}: Regenerate Duty-Bound Dead.

card.name: Elderscale Wurm
card.text: Trample When Elderscale Wurm enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than 7, your life total becomes 7. As long as you have 7 or more life, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 7 reduces it to 7 instead.

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Encrust
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Erase
card.text: Exile target enchantment.

card.name: Essence Drain
card.text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Essence Scatter
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Faith's Reward
card.text: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Farseek

card.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.text: Flinthoof Boar gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. {R}: Flinthoof Boar gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Hydrosurge

card.text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

card.name: Prey Upon

card.name: Primal Clay

card.name: Primordial Hydra
card.text: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.text: Prized Elephant gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Forest. {G}: Prized Elephant gains trample until end of turn.

Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
